intent:
When a new item is saved to Pocket, check if it meets certain conditions and then add the item as a task in Todoist.

The filter code should extract the title, URL, excerpt, image URL, tags, and added at date/time from the Pocket item. It will then create a new task in Todoist with specific details based on these extracted values.
